   19: %%
   20: -module(erl_anno_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %%-define(debug, true).
   23: 
   24: -ifdef(debug).
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -define(format(S, A), io:format(S, A)).
   27: -else.
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: -define(format(S, A), ok).
   30: -endif.
   31: 
   32: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   33:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   35: 
   36: -export([new/1, is_anno/1, generated/1, end_location/1, file/1,
   37:          line/1, location/1, record/1, text/1, bad/1]).
   38: 
   39: -export([parse_abstract/1, mapfold_anno/1]).
   40: 
   41: all() ->
   42:     [{group, anno}, {group, parse}].
   43: 
   44: groups() ->
   45:     [{anno, [], [new, is_anno, generated, end_location, file,
   46:                  line, location, record, text, bad]},
   47:      {parse, [], [parse_abstract, mapfold_anno]}].
   48: 
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   51:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   52: 
   53: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   57:     ok.
   58: 
   59: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   69:     ok.
   70: 
   71: -define(INFO(T, V), {T, V}).
   72: 
   73: -dialyzer({no_fail_call, new/1}).
   74: %% Test erl_anno:new/1.
   75: new(_Config) ->
   76:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
   77:         (catch erl_anno:new([{location,1},{text, "text"}])), % badarg
   78:     ok.
   79: 
   80: %% Test erl_anno:is_anno/1.
   81: is_anno(_Config) ->
   82:     false = erl_anno:is_anno(a),
   83:     false = erl_anno:is_anno({a}),
   84:     false = erl_anno:is_anno([]),
   85:     false = erl_anno:is_anno([{location, 1}|{generated, true}]),
   86:     false = erl_anno:is_anno([{generated,false}]),
   87:     false = erl_anno:is_anno([{generated,true}]),
   88:     false = erl_anno:is_anno([{location,1},{file,nofile}]),
   89:     false = erl_anno:is_anno([{location,1},{text,notext}]),
   90: 
   91:     true = erl_anno:is_anno(erl_anno:new(1)),
   92:     A0 = erl_anno:new({1, 17}),
   93:     true = erl_anno:is_anno(A0),
   94:     A1 = erl_anno:set_generated(true, A0),
   95:     true = erl_anno:is_anno(A1),
   96:     A2 = erl_anno:set_file("", A1),
   97:     true = erl_anno:is_anno(A2),
   98:     A3 = erl_anno:set_record(true, A2),
   99:     true = erl_anno:is_anno(A3),
  100:     A4 = erl_anno:set_text("text", A3),
  101:     true = erl_anno:is_anno(A4),
  102:     A5 = erl_anno:set_file(<<"filename">>, A4),
  103:     true = erl_anno:is_anno(A5),
  104:     ok.
  105: 
  106: %% Test 'generated'.
  107: generated(_Config) ->
  108:     test(1, [{generated, true}, {generated, false}]),
  109:     test(1, [{generated, false}, {generated, true}, {generated, false}]),
  110:     test({1, 17}, [{generated, false},
  111:                    {generated, true},
  112:                    {generated, false}]),
  113:     test({1, 17}, [{text, "text", [{end_location, {1, 21}}, {length, 4}]},
  114:                    {generated, false},
  115:                    {generated, true},
  116:                    {generated, false}]),
  117:     test(1, [{generated, false},
  118:              {generated, true},
  119:              {generated, false}]),
  120:     test(1, [{text, "text", [{end_location, 1}, {length, 4}]},
  121:              {generated, false},
  122:              {generated, true},
  123:              {generated, false}]),
  124:     ok.
  125: 
  126: %% Test 'end_location'.
  127: end_location(_Config) ->
  128:     test({1, 17}, [{text, "TEXT", [{end_location, {1, 21}}, {length, 4}]},
  129:                    {text, "TEXT\n", [{end_location, {2, 1}}, {length, 5}]},
  130:                    {text, "TEXT\ntxt", [{end_location, {2, 4}}, {length, 8}]}]),
  131:     test(1, [{text, "TEXT", [{end_location, 1}, {length, 4}]},
  132:              {text, "TEXT\n", [{end_location, 2}, {length, 5}]},
  133:              {text, "TEXT\ntxt", [{end_location, 2}, {length, 8}]}]),
  134:     ok.
  135: 
  136: %% Test 'file'.
  137: file(_Config) ->
  138:     test(1, [{file, "name"}, {file, ""}]),
  139:     test({1, 17}, [{file, "name"}, {file, ""}]),
  140:     ok.
  141: 
  142: %% Test 'line'.
  143: line(_Config) ->
  144:     test(1, [{line, 17, [{location, 17}]},
  145:              {location, {9, 8}, [{line, 9}, {column, 8}]},
  146:              {line, 14, [{location, {14, 8}}]}]),
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: %% Test 'location'.
  150: location(_Config) ->
  151:     test(1, [{location, 2, [{line,2}]},
  152:              {location, {1, 17}, [{line, 1}, {column, 17}]},
  153:              {location, {9, 6}, [{line, 9}, {column, 6}]},
  154:              {location, 9, [{column, undefined}]}]),
  155:     test(1, [{generated, true},
  156:              {location, 2, [{line,2}]},
  157:              {location, {1, 17}, [{line, 1}, {column, 17}]},
  158:              {location, {9, 6}, [{line, 9}, {column, 6}]},
  159:              {location, 9, [{column, undefined}]}]),
  160:     test(1, [{record, true},
  161:              {location, 2, [{line,2}]},
  162:              {location, {1, 17}, [{line, 1}, {column, 17}]},
  163:              {location, {9, 6}, [{line, 9}, {column, 6}]},
  164:              {location, 9, [{column, undefined}]}]),
  165:     ok.
  166: 
  167: %% Test 'record'.
  168: record(_Config) ->
  169:     test({1, 17}, [{record, true}, {record, false}]),
  170:     test(1, [{record, true}, {record, false}]),
  171:     test({1, 17}, [{generated, false},
  172:                    {generated, true},
  173:                    {generated, false}]),
  174:     test({1, 17}, [{text, "text", [{end_location, {1, 21}}, {length, 4}]},
  175:                    {generated, false},
  176:                    {generated, true},
  177:                    {generated, false}]),
  178:     test(1, [{generated, false},
  179:              {generated, true},
  180:              {generated, false}]),
  181:     test(1, [{text, "text", [{end_location, 1}, {length, 4}]},
  182:              {generated, false},
  183:              {generated, true},
  184:              {generated, false}]),
  185:     ok.
  186: 
  187: %% Test 'text'.
  188: text(_Config) ->
  189:     test(1, [{text, "text", [{end_location, 1}, {length, 4}]},
  190:              {text, "", [{end_location, 1}, {length, 0}]}]),
  191:     test({1, 17}, [{text, "text", [{end_location, {1,21}}, {length, 4}]},
  192:                    {text, "", [{end_location, {1,17}}, {length, 0}]}]),
  193:     ok.
  194: 
  195: -dialyzer({[no_opaque, no_fail_call], bad/1}).
  196: %% Test bad annotations.
  197: bad(_Config) ->
  198:     Line = erl_anno:new(1),
  199:     LineColumn = erl_anno:new({1, 17}),
  200:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  201:         (catch erl_anno:set_generated(true, bad)), % 3rd arg not opaque
  202:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  203:         (catch erl_anno:set_generated(false, bad)), % 3rd arg not opaque
  204:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  205:         (catch erl_anno:set_generated(19, Line)),
  206:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  207:         (catch erl_anno:set_generated(19, LineColumn)),
  208: 
  209:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  210:         (catch erl_anno:generated(bad)), % 1st arg not opaque
  211:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  212:         (catch erl_anno:end_location(bad)), % 1st arg not opaque
  213:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  214:         (catch erl_anno:file(bad)), % 1st arg not opaque
  215:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  216:         (catch erl_anno:text(bad)), % 1st arg not opaque
  217:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  218:         (catch erl_anno:record(bad)), % 1st arg not opaque
  219:     ok.
  220: 
  221: %% Test erl_parse:new_anno/1, erl_parse:anno_to_term/1,
  222: %% and erl_parse:anno_from_term/1.
  223: parse_abstract(_Config) ->
  224:     T = sample_term(),
  225:     A = erl_parse:abstract(T, [{line,17}]),
  226:     T1 = erl_parse:anno_to_term(A),
  227:     Abstr = erl_parse:new_anno(T1),
  228:     T = erl_parse:normalise(Abstr),
  229:     Abstr2 = erl_parse:anno_from_term(T1),
  230:     T = erl_parse:normalise(Abstr2),
  231:     ok.
  232: 
  233: %% Test erl_parse:{map_anno/2,fold_anno/3, and mapfold_anno/3}.
  234: mapfold_anno(_Config) ->
  235:     T = sample_term(),
  236:     Abstr = erl_parse:abstract(T),
  237:     CF = fun(Anno, {L, D}) ->
  238:                  {erl_anno:new(L), {L+1, dict:store(L, Anno, D)}}
  239:          end,
  240:     {U, {N, D}} = erl_parse:mapfold_anno(CF, {1, dict:new()}, Abstr),
  241:     SeqA = erl_parse:fold_anno(fun(Anno, Acc) -> [Anno|Acc] end, [], U),
  242:     Seq = [erl_anno:location(A) || A <- SeqA],
  243:     Seq = lists:seq(N-1, 1, -1),
  244:     NF = fun(Anno) ->
  245:                  L = erl_anno:location(Anno),
  246:                  dict:fetch(L, D)
  247:          end,
  248:     Abstr = erl_parse:map_anno(NF, U),
  249:     ok.
  250: 
  251: sample_term() ->
  252:     %% This is just a sample.
  253:     {3,a,4.0,"foo",<<"bar">>,#{a => <<19:64/unsigned-little>>},
  254:      [1000,2000]}.
  255: 
  256: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  257: 
  258: test(StartLocation, Updates) ->
  259:     S0 = init(StartLocation),
  260:     A0 = erl_anno:new(StartLocation),
  261:     chk(S0, A0, []),
  262:     eval(Updates, S0, A0).
  263: 
  264: eval([], _S0, _A0) ->
  265:     ok;
  266: eval([{Item, Value}|Updates], S0, A0) ->
  267:     {S, A} = set(Item, Value, A0, S0, []),
  268:     eval(Updates, S, A);
  269: eval([{Item, Value, Secondary}|Updates], S0, A0) ->
  270:     {S, A} = set(Item, Value, A0, S0, Secondary),
  271:     eval(Updates, S, A).
  272: 
  273: init({Line, Column}) ->
  274:     lists:sort([{location, {Line, Column}} | default()]);
  275: init(Line) when is_integer(Line) ->
  276:     lists:sort([{location, Line} | default()]).
  277: 
  278: set(Item, Value, Anno0, State0, Secondary) ->
  279:     true = lists:member(Item, primary_items()),
  280:     ?format("Set '~w' to ~p\n", [Item, Value]),
  281:     State = set_value(Item, Value, State0),
  282:     Anno = anno_set(Item, Value, Anno0),
  283:     ?format("State0 ~p\n", [State0]),
  284:     ?format("State  ~p\n", [State]),
  285:     ?format("Anno0  ~p\n", [anno_to_term(Anno0)]),
  286:     ?format("Anno   ~p\n", [anno_to_term(Anno)]),
  287:     chk(State, Anno, Secondary),
  288:     ok = frame(Anno0, Anno, Secondary),
  289:     {State, Anno}.
  290: 
  291: frame(OldAnno, NewAnno, Secondary) ->
  292:     SecItems = [I || {I, _} <- Secondary],
  293:     Frame = secondary_items() -- (SecItems ++ primary_items()),
  294:     ?format("Frame items ~p\n", [Frame]),
  295:     frame1(Frame, OldAnno, NewAnno).
  296: 
  297: frame1([], _OldAnno, _NewAnno) ->
  298:     ok;
  299: frame1([Item|Items], OldAnno, NewAnno) ->
  300:     V1 = anno_info(OldAnno, Item),
  301:     V2 = anno_info(NewAnno, Item),
  302:     ok = check_value(Item, V1, V2),
  303:     frame1(Items, OldAnno, NewAnno).
  304: 
  305: chk(State, Anno, Secondary) ->
  306:     ok = check_simple(Anno),
  307:     ok = chk_primary(State, Anno),
  308:     ok = check_secondary(Secondary, State, Anno).
  309: 
  310: chk_primary(State, Anno) ->
  311:     chk_primary(primary_items(), State, Anno).
  312: 
  313: chk_primary([], _State, _Anno) ->
  314:     ok;
  315: chk_primary([Item | Items], State, Anno) ->
  316:     V1 = primary_value(Item, State),
  317:     V2 = anno_info(Anno, Item),
  318:     ok = check_value(Item, V1, V2),
  319:     chk_primary(Items, State, Anno).
  320: 
  321: check_secondary([], _State, _Anno) ->
  322:     ok;
  323: check_secondary([{Item, _}=V1 | Secondary], State, Anno) ->
  324:     V2 = anno_info(Anno, Item),
  325:     case {V1, V2} of
  326:         {{Item, undefined}, undefined} ->
  327:             ok;
  328:         _ ->
  329:             ok = check_value(Item, V1, V2)
  330:     end,
  331:     check_secondary(Secondary, State, Anno).
  332: 
  333: check_value(Item, V1, V2) ->
  334:     ?format("~w: V1 ~p\n", [Item, V1]),
  335:     ?format("~w: V2 ~p\n", [Item, V2]),
  336:     case V1 =:= V2 of
  337:         true ->
  338:             ok;
  339:         false ->
  340:             io:format("~w: expected ~p\n got     ~p\n", [Item, V1, V2]),
  341:             exit({V1, V2})
  342:     end.
  343: 
  344: check_simple(Anno) ->
  345:     Term = anno_to_term(Anno),
  346:     case find_defaults(Term) of
  347:         [] ->
  348:             ok;
  349:         Ds ->
  350:             io:format("found default values ~w in ~p\n", [Ds, Anno]),
  351:             exit({defaults, Anno})
  352:     end,
  353:     case check_simple1(Term) of
  354:         true ->
  355:             ok;
  356:         false ->
  357:             io:format("not simple ~p\n", [Anno]),
  358:             exit({not_simple, Anno})
  359:     end.
  360: 
  361: check_simple1(L) when is_integer(L) ->
  362:     true;
  363: check_simple1({L, C}) when is_integer(L), is_integer(C) ->
  364:     true;
  365: check_simple1(List) ->
  366:     case lists:sort(List) of
  367:         [{location, _}] ->
  368:             false;
  369:         _ ->
  370:             true
  371:     end.
  372: 
  373: find_defaults(L) when is_list(L) ->
  374:     [I ||
  375:         I <- default_items(),
  376:         {I1, Value} <- L,
  377:         I =:= I1,
  378:         Value =:= default_value(I)];
  379: find_defaults(_) ->
  380:     [].
  381: 
  382: anno_to_term(Anno) ->
  383:     T = erl_anno:to_term(Anno),
  384:     maybe_sort(T).
  385: 
  386: maybe_sort(L) when is_list(L) ->
  387:     lists:sort(L);
  388: maybe_sort(T) ->
  389:     T.
  390: 
  391: anno_set(file, Value, Anno) ->
  392:     erl_anno:set_file(Value, Anno);
  393: anno_set(generated, Value, Anno) ->
  394:     erl_anno:set_generated(Value, Anno);
  395: anno_set(line, Value, Anno) ->
  396:     erl_anno:set_line(Value, Anno);
  397: anno_set(location, Value, Anno) ->
  398:     erl_anno:set_location(Value, Anno);
  399: anno_set(record, Value, Anno) ->
  400:     erl_anno:set_record(Value, Anno);
  401: anno_set(text, Value, Anno) ->
  402:     erl_anno:set_text(Value, Anno).
  403: 
  404: anno_info(Anno, Item) ->
  405:     Value =
  406:         case Item of
  407:             column ->
  408:                 erl_anno:column(Anno);
  409:             generated ->
  410:                 erl_anno:generated(Anno);
  411:             end_location ->
  412:                 erl_anno:end_location(Anno);
  413:             file ->
  414:                 erl_anno:file(Anno);
  415:             length ->
  416:                 case erl_anno:text(Anno) of
  417:                     undefined ->
  418:                         undefined;
  419:                     Text ->
  420:                         length(Text)
  421:                 end;
  422:             line ->
  423:                 erl_anno:line(Anno);
  424:             location ->
  425:                 erl_anno:location(Anno);
  426:             record ->
  427:                 erl_anno:record(Anno);
  428:             text ->
  429:                 erl_anno:text(Anno);
  430:             _ ->
  431:                 erlang:error(badarg, [Anno, Item])
  432:         end,
  433:     if
  434:         Value =:= undefined ->
  435:             undefined;
  436:         true ->
  437:             {Item, Value}
  438:     end.
  439: 
  440: %%% Originally 'location' was primary while 'line' and 'column' were
  441: %%% secondary (their values are determined by 'location'). But since
  442: %%% set_line() is used kind of frequently, 'line' is also primary,
  443: %%% and 'location' secondary (depends on 'line'). 'line' need to be
  444: %%% handled separately.
  445: 
  446: set_value(line, Line, State) ->
  447:     {location, Location} = primary_value(location, State),
  448:     NewLocation = case Location of
  449:                       {_, Column} ->
  450:                           {Line, Column};
  451:                       _ ->
  452:                           Line
  453:                   end,
  454:     set_value(location, NewLocation, State);
  455: set_value(Item, Value, State) ->
  456:     lists:ukeymerge(1, [{Item, Value}], State).
  457: 
  458: primary_value(line, State) ->
  459:     {location, Location} = primary_value(location, State),
  460:     {line, case Location of
  461:                {Line, _} ->
  462:                    Line;
  463:                Line ->
  464:                    Line
  465:            end};
  466: primary_value(Item, State) ->
  467:     case lists:keyfind(Item, 1, State) of
  468:         false ->
  469:             undefined;
  470:         Tuple ->
  471:             Tuple
  472:     end.
  473: 
  474: default() ->
  475:     [{Tag, default_value(Tag)} || Tag <- default_items()].
  476: 
  477: primary_items() ->
  478:     [file, generated, line, location, record, text].
  479: 
  480: secondary_items() ->
  481:     %% 'length' has not been implemented
  482:     [column, end_location, length, line, location].
  483: 
  484: default_items() ->
  485:     [generated, record].
  486: 
  487: default_value(generated) -> false;
  488: default_value(record) -> false.
